body:
# Martin Lensment Portfolio

***

## Notable projects
### Allkiri.ee (2012 - present)
Digital signing service for companies and individuals.
Technologies: Ruby On Rails, HTML5, CSS, Javascript, MongoDB

### BOSU - Bonus Money Calculation System (2012 - present)
Back-end (data loading process, database procedures to calculate bonus money) and administrative front-end interface for Kaubamaja Group internal use.
Technologies: Play Framework, HTML5, CSS, Javascript, Oracle

### Guide-The-Ball (2012 - present)
A game prototype for mobile browsers. The object of the game is to move the ball by tilting the mobile and avoiding randomly generated walls.
Technologies: Javascript

### Multiplayer Snake (2012)
A game, programmed in Javascript. Back-end is written in NodeJS.
[https://github.com/mlensment/smake](https://github.com/mlensment/smake)
Technologies: NodeJS, Javascript

### Singleplayer Snake (2012)
A basic Snake game.
[http://byte.net.ee/snake/](http://byte.net.ee/snake/)
[https://github.com/mlensment/snake](https://github.com/mlensment/snake)
Technologies: Javascript

### CCS - Credit Card System (2011 - present)
Back-end application for Säästukaart+ to manage applications, contracts, cards etc. For ETK Finance internal use.
Technologies: Ruby On Rails, HTML5, CSS, Javascript, PostgreSQL

### COFI (2011 - present)
Consumer Financing Service.
Technologies: Ruby On Rails 2.3, Javascript, PostgreSQL

### Sõiduplaan (2011)
Windows Phone 7 public transport app for Tallinn and Harjumaa
Public transport app for WP7 platform. Done as a group of 3 people.
[https://github.com/msokk/Soiduplaan](https://github.com/msokk/Soiduplaan)
Technologies: C#, Silverlight
![wp7](images/wp7.png)

### HAL (2010)
A football robot for Robotex 2010
Some footage from the competition: [[www]](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tZs97A68c-w) We came fourth.
[Wiki page](https://wiki.itcollege.ee/index.php/HAL)
Technologies: C++
![robotex2010](images/robotex.png)

### Hype (2010)
A simple game. The object of the game is to guide the hedgehog and reach as high as possible.
[https://github.com/msokk/hype](https://github.com/msokk/hype)
Technologies: C#, XNA

## Personal information
Name: Martin Lensment
Position: Software Engineer
Date of birth: 29.08.1990
### Education
2012 -          Tallinn University of Technology - Electronics and Bionics
2009 - 2012 	The Estonian Information Technology College - Software Engineering
name: Martin Lensment
